name: Take Care Tuesdays
description: Take Care Tuesday is an ongoing support group that is open to all LGBTQIA2-Spirit survivors of violence held on Tuesday evenings. Their curriculum incorporates wellness skills that support participant's healing and self-care practices. Please join Take Care Tuesday (TCT), which has a focus on holding spaces for one another, practicing self-care together, and supporting each other through emotional processes. The support group has co-created the space to affirm themselves and each other. Time: Di

howToGetIt: To sign up, visit https://www.cuav.org/tct and click on "sign up".
address: 427 South Van Ness Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94103
